description: From 1100m elevation hike northeast up steep timbered meadows to a series of rocky subalpine ridges along historic mineral prospecting trails as shown on GSC Geologic Map 272A (Cairns, 1932). Trail ends at an unnamed summit (2183m)above 8 Mile Basin, 2km west of Mt Aylwin (2521m).  Views toward northward to Silverton, New Denver and Slocan Lake.
directions:
Drive east up Enterprise Creek FSR 3.2km, follow spur logging roads north and west to recent clearcuts at the 1100m level.  Hike up to top of cutblock and head northwestward through open timber to intersect switchbacking trail at 1328m elevation.  Continue along trail to summit. 
Enterprise Creek FSR  starts 16.0km South along Hiway 6 from the Hiways 6 and 31A corner in New Denver.
title: Highland Light
